title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 441.75 - Critical care units
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 441.75 - Critical care units

State Regulations
A discrete inpatient unit within the hospital providing
maximum surveillance/support of vital functions; definitive therapy for
patients with acute but reversible life-threatening impairments; patient
monitoring; cardiopulmonary resuscitation; other life support techniques; and a
staff of health professionals who have received specialized training in the
provision of these services. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
441.75

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
